page.title: 14Church of the Holy Spirit.
page.content: The church at Rye Harbour is called the{Church of the Holy Spirit and it {was built in 1847}and is part of the Rye Group ministry. It is made of stone with a wooden roof in the shape of the hull of a boat.{The vicar of {St. Mary's Church Rye }takes services every other Sunday. In the churchyard there is a memorial for the 17 men who died in the {Mary {Stanford Lifeboat Tragedy in 1928.} {Each year a service}is held to remember those who died.The church interior walls also retain memories of those who died through pictures and writing. { + { * { * * { * * { *} {********** {* * {***************
